message: Bob, I believe this product will be incredibly valuable to your operations, even more than my own use for it.  To kick things off, I'm offering it to you for $1,300,000.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice, but I'm not quite ready to commit to that price. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me, and I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $900,000 undervalues the unique benefits this product offers. Let's find a compromise. I'm willing to come down to $1,175,000.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,050,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my operations.
